item.title: TikTok Video Creator for Children's Niche - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a TikTok video creator to produce 30 videos in the field of children's content. The videos should be captivating and simple, designed to engage a young audience. The content will cover various topics related to children, including educational activities, storytelling, and entertainment.

**NOTE**: You will not have to make any of these videos from scratch. We will be taking existing 1 hour content available online, and just cutting it up into short 1 minute clips and adding subtitles.

Here is an example of the long-form video that has not been edited into short content: https://youtu.be/T9ViFtzplf8?si=N-ghdd6w5hGxdj2O
Here is an example of an edited 1-minute video based on the above 60-minute video:
https://www.youtube.com/shorts/IQraXtZMpQw

The goal will be to produce 30 short clips, like the one above, with subtitles and nice editing, based on a long-form video.

The ideal candidate should have a deep understanding of the TikTok platform, including its features and current trends. They should be able to create visually appealing videos using a creative and fun approach.

Key skills required for this project include proficiency in video editing tools, knowledge of the children's niche, the ability to create engaging and age-appropriate content, and a grasp of popular TikTok trends.

If you have a passion for creating captivating TikTok videos for children, we would love to hear from you! This is an excellent opportunity to showcase your creativity and establish yourself in the TikTok content creator community.

Budget: $60

item.title: Seeking Video Designer for Animated Project - Upwork
item.description:
We are in search of a dynamic Video Designer to help us bring a revolutionary project to life through a compelling animated video. This project stands at the intersection of innovation and tradition, aiming to spearhead a significant shift in the way Labour Union operate. Your role will be crucial in crafting a visual narrative that resonates with our targeted audience.

Responsibilities

1) Collaborate closely with our team to understand the project’s core message and vision.
2) Develop an engaging and visually captivating animated video that succinctly outlines the essence of our project.
3) Use your creative prowess to produce a storyboard that aligns with our project’s tone and message.
4) Translate the storyboard into a fluid, coherent, and visually striking animated video.
5 ) Incorporate high-quality graphics and visual effects to enhance the viewer's experience.
6) Be open to revisions and adjustments to meet the project’s evolving requirements.

What we are looking for

1) Proven experience in video design, particularly in creating animated videos.
2) Strong portfolio showcasing your previous work, highlighting your expertise in animation and video editing.
3) Proficiency in using video editing software such as Adobe After Effects, Premiere Pro, or similar platforms.
4) Exceptional creativity and innovation with a keen eye for aesthetics and visual details.
5) Excellent communication skills to understand and translate our vision into a captivating animated narrative.

Thank you for applying for this project and we look forward to working with you.
